thawada nawda oba naga ya haki sathunda oba wenuwen nirmanaya kaleya. 43-13 shuddha wu kuraanaya eewaye pita konda matha oba (naga) wadi wima sandaha, ee matha oba (thrupthimathwa wana andamata) wadi wuwahoth obage dewiyan pahala kala mema waraprasadaya mathak kara, (me wenuwen oba ohuwa namada) “me matha (nagimata) shakthiyak nomaththan washayen siti apata meya wasanga kara dun aya ithamath parishuddhawanthayeki” yayida- 43-14 shuddha wu kuraanaya “niyatha washayenma api apage dewiyan wethama aapasu yannemu” yayida pawasanu manawa! 43-15 shuddha wu kuraanaya (samanayan thaba namadina) owun ohuge wahalungen (wu malayikawarun-gen) ek parshawayak ohuta (gahanu daruwan) bawata path karannaha.

eda sanduda udenma wadata giye dawas dekaka niwaduwakata passe.matanam sanduda dawase wisheshayak thibune wenadata labena pappa wage adu sini wadi wathurath ekka dena kiri the eeka wenuwata sampurna yodaya sahitha kiri widuruwak labenne ee aayathanaye sandudata thiyena manejmant mitin eeka nisa.paya dekaka nidimatha nathiwenna kiyapu panaya.kalayage awamen matath ee mitin ekata sahabhagi wenna (a)wasanawa labuna.hama denagema prashna sakachcha karala awasanayata enne mage prashna gana.eeth mage dpartment eke kawadawath prashnayak na.sathiya gewaganna prashnayak nathnam ee sathiya amuthuwata danenne.ee siyalla awasanaye supurudu paridi ofis eeka wate yanne monawage prashna thiyeda kiyala podi adahasak ganna .hama dama wage kakul digawadi kellek gen thiyena karadarayak wunu "netwark kebal" eeka galawan dangalilla edath thibuna.wathura dala madan aapu shart eeka podi nowenna mese yata amaruwen ringaddima mage durakathanaya dedaruwa.makunu dal kadagena mese yatin nagitte ee kellata baninna thiyena hama wachanayakma munen aaropanaya kara genamayi.

ee wipaksha nayaka karyalaye eeye (31) pawathi wishesha sakachchawen anathuruwala madhya wetha adahas dakwaminga wipaksha nayaka sajith premadasa saha eksath jathika pakshaye parlimenthu manthriwarun athara ema wishesha sakachchawa pawathwuna.kese wethath, parlimenthu manthri pi.harisan nochchiyagama pradeshayedi ada (01) madhya wetha adahas dakwamin kiya sitiye nawa sandhanaye mahalekam dhuraya eksath jathika paksha samajikayekuta himiwiya yuthu bawata kruthyadhikari mandala raswimedi sakachcha wu bawayi.

shri lanka janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha wetha indiyawe ihalama janatha sammanaya pirinamannayi indiya janatha pakshaya erata aanduwen illimak kara atha.el.ti.ti.ee thrasthawadaya sarthaka lesa parajayata pathkaramin ee mahatha samastha lokayatama aadarshayak sapaya athayida indiya janatha pakshaye nayaka aacharya subramaniyam swami mahatha prakasha kara thibe.ee nisama indiyawe ihalama janatha sammanaya wana bharatha rathna sammanaya janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha wetha pirinamannayi aacharya subramaniyam swami mahatha indiya agamathi aacharya man mohan sin mahathagen illimak kara atha.thamilnadu pranthaye koyimbathurhi di wishesha prakashayak karamin hethema me bawa prakasha kara athayi wartha weyi.me athara indiya hamuda samajikayan wenuwen thrasthawadaya pitudakima udesa shri lankawedi puhunuwa labadimata thiranaya kirima sambandhayen prasadaya palakara thibena aacharya subramaniyam swami mahatha shri lankawe wathman thaththwaya ithama yahapath bawada shri lankawata gos aayojanaya karannayi thamilnadu wyaparikayangen illimak karana bawada sandahan kara atha.eeta amatharawa ee mahatha sandahan kara aththe shri lankawe wathman yahapath wathawaranaya prayojanayata gena indiya sisunata shri lankawe di adhyapana katayuthuwala niratha wiyahaki bawayi..

in anathuruwa, nihal shri amarasekara wisin 2012.1.18 dina darana mosamak magin ihathaki sanshodhitha pethsamen illa aththe ihatha sadahan hadisi panath ketumpatha pilibada ‘thiranaya’ wadath pupul winisuru madullak wisin samalochanaya kota, nawatha parikshakara balana lesata wana bawin, ee sadaha winishcha madullak sansthapanaya karana lesata saha eya winisuruwarun 5 denekugen ho eeta wadi sankhyawakin samanwitha wiyayuthu bawa nihal shri amarasekara wisin athigaru shirani bandaranayaka agawinisuruthumiyagen, aandukrama wyawasthawe 132 wyawasthawa yatathe illa sitina ladde wi namuth, ema illima nothakamin, ema samalochanaya kirima saha nawatha salaka balima aya wisin garu en.ji. amarathunga winisuruthumage pradhanathwayen yuth winisuru madulla idiriye 2012.2.9 dina thahawurukara sitina lesata yomukarana ladi.
